entry.title: New release for Explo: v0.3.0
entry.content:
v0.3.0 CHANGELOG

[CHANGE] Added PERSIST flag to .env [FEATURE] Setting PERSIST to true will retain downloaded files and organize the playlist by week (this is the default setting). Setting it to false will regenerate the playlist weekly and delete all files in the download folder, as specified in the .env file.

Note: Do not set PERSIST to false if your download folder contains files other than those downloaded by Explo.

entry.title: New release for Explo: v0.4.0
entry.content:
v0.4.0 CHANGELOG

[FEATURE] Explo will now prefer Topic or artist personal channels to get songs. Hopefully this helps avoid random videos/songs being downloaded [FIX] Fixed unmarshal error when parsing response from ListenBrainz

entry.title: New release for Explo: v0.4.5
entry.content:
v0.4.5 CHANGELOG

[IMPROVEMENT] Added support to define custom filename separator when removing special characters from filenames ( FILENAME_SEPARATOR in local.env) - aa169c1 [IMPROVEMENT] Added support to add custom ffmpeg binary path, (FFMPEG_PATH in local.env) - 00c0090 [FIX] Fixed wrong track being inserted to playlist - 8b4ee385

Support for MPD coming soon

entry.title: New release for Explo: v0.5.0
entry.content:
v0.5.0 CHANGELOG

[SUPPORT] Added support for Music Player Daemon (MPD) - e15e5f5

  • Users can now define the playlist path with PLAYLIST_DIR variable in local.env

[FIX] Resolved an issue where .webm files couldn't be deleted under certain conditions - a5fd42b [QoL] Added functions to verify the format of directory variables - fbd419c

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LumePart/Explo/compare/v0.4.5...v0.5.0

entry.title: New release for Explo: v0.6.0
entry.content:
v0.6.0 CHANGELOG

NOTE: Even though this release contains some deprecations regarding .env variables, everything should still work with the old variables!

[SUPPORT] Added support for Jellyfin

  • Users can now add a Jellyfin API key with API_KEY variable in local.env

[FIX] Incorrect encoding type used for Subsonic credential generation, causing occasional authentication failures. - faacf1c

[QoL] Renamed some Subsonic specific local.env variable names to fit with Jellyfin implementation and added warnings about deprecated variables. [QoL] Improved error handling and logging for Subsonic

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LumePart/Explo/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0
